name: Honey-Roasted Cayenne Walnuts
author: larmcc
summary: This is super-easy to make. Especially when using high-quality ingredients, these wonderful walnuts can be added to salads or yogurt or just eaten plain.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Add walnuts to a heat-resistant bowl
Melt butter in a nonstick skillet over medium heat
Mix in honey and cayenne pepper and pour mixture over walnuts in the bowl
Spread coated walnuts onto the prepared baking sheet and quickly separate nuts using a spatula or fork
Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes
Stir and continue baking until golden brown, 5 to 10 minutes more
